info.name: CAFM Complete API Collection
info.description: Comprehensive API collection for CAFM Backend System covering all 7 major areas: Authentication, Asset Management, Work Orders, Schools/Companies, User Management, Reporting, and System Integration.

item.name: üîê Authentication & Security
item.description: All authentication, security, and user management endpoints

request.description: Authenticate user and return JWT tokens
Get new access token using refresh token
Reset password using token from email

item.name: üèóÔ∏è Asset Management
item.description: Physical asset and equipment management endpoints

request.description: Get paginated list of assets with filtering

body.raw:
{
  "name": "Dell Laptop XPS 13",
  "code": "LAP001",

request.description: Assign an asset to a user

item.name: üîß Work Order & Maintenance
item.description: Work order management, maintenance scheduling, and task tracking endpoints

request.description: Get paginated list of work orders with filtering

body.raw:
{
  "title": "Fix Air Conditioning Unit",
  "description": "AC unit not cooling properly in Room 101",
  "priority": "HIGH",
  "schoolId": "{{school_id}}",
  "assetId": "{{asset_id}}",
  "requestedBy": "{{user_id}}",
  "estimatedHours": 4,
  "dueDate": "2024-02-01"
}

{
  "completionDate": "2024-01-28",
  "actualHours": 3.5,
  "materialsUsed": "Refrigerant, filter",
  "notes": "AC unit fixed and working properly",
  "qualityRating": 5
}
